text: Can be reproduced with JDK1.6.0_21 or later.

For some reason the space at the end of the first span is throwing off the centering.  I'm not sure why. I suspect somehow the alignment calculation for the second span ends up being applied to the first tspan as well.
BTW I see the same error in Batik as in the rasterizer.
creator: deweese@apache.org

> BTW I see the same error in Batik as in the rasterizer.

Those are the same symptoms already described in issue 49736. I've double checked that the issue reproduces with Squiggle and JDK 7 on Windows 7 and that the current known workaround - removing the white-space between the tspan elements - helps avoiding this issue.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 49736 ***
